alert.note: Alert for Forsyth (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued July 05 at 7:49PM EDT until July 05 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM EDT THIS EVENING FOR FORSYTH COUNTY... At 749 PM EDT, emergency management reported flash flooding occurring in Winston-Salem. Up to 4 inches of rain have fallen. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Emergency management reported. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Winston-Salem, Kernersville, Clemmons, King, Lewisville, Walkertown, Rural Hall, Pfafftown, Stanleyville, Sedge Garden and Donnaha. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
